Coverage: South Vicksburg, Quartzsite,& Ehrenburg, Bouse, Parker; Lake Havasu City, and Needles, North&East Mohave Valley, Ft. Mohave, Bullhead, Golden Valley, Dolan Springs, Kingman and Truxton. 50 mi radius.
Sponsor: London Bridge Amateur Radio Association, Inc K7LHC
Affiliate: London Bridge Amateur Radio Association, Inc K7LHC
Features: This is a Yaesu System Fusion DR-2X with Lan unit repeater. It is set in AMS mode so it will handle Analog or Digital traffic. In the future this repeater may be connected to Wires-X. No longer linked to the KL7MPR repeaters in Kingman or Bullhead.
Nets: LBARA Net Tuesday night at 6:30 pm. No longer hosting Mohave Amateur Radio Club Nets on this repeater.
Web links: London Bridge Amateur Radio Association, Inc K7LHC
